Member Function Documentation

String liquibase.database.Database.getDefaultDriver ( String  url  ) 

If this database understands the given url, return the default driver class name.

Otherwise return null.

Implemented in liquibase.database.CacheDatabase, liquibase.database.DB2Database, liquibase.database.DerbyDatabase, liquibase.database.FirebirdDatabase, liquibase.database.H2Database, liquibase.database.HsqlDatabase, liquibase.database.MaxDBDatabase, liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase, liquibase.database.MySQLDatabase, liquibase.database.OracleDatabase, liquibase.database.PostgresDatabase, liquibase.database.SybaseDatabase, and liquibase.database.UnsupportedDatabase.

boolean liquibase.database.Database.supportsDDLInTransaction (  ) 

Determines if the database supports DDL within a transaction or not.

Returns:
True if the database supports DDL within a transaction, otherwise false.

Implemented in liquibase.database.AbstractDatabase, liquibase.database.FirebirdDatabase, and liquibase.database.SybaseDatabase.

String liquibase.database.Database.getProductName (  ) 

Returns the full database product name.

May be different than what the JDBC connection reports (getDatabaseProductName())

Implemented in liquibase.database.CacheDatabase, liquibase.database.DB2Database, liquibase.database.DerbyDatabase, liquibase.database.FirebirdDatabase, liquibase.database.H2Database, liquibase.database.HsqlDatabase, liquibase.database.MaxDBDatabase, liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase, liquibase.database.MySQLDatabase, liquibase.database.OracleDatabase, liquibase.database.PostgresDatabase, liquibase.database.SybaseDatabase, and liquibase.database.UnsupportedDatabase.

Referenced by liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(), and liquibase.database.AbstractDatabase.toString().

String liquibase.database.Database.getTypeName (  ) 

Returns an all-lower-case short name of the product.

Used for end-user selecting of database type such as the DBMS precondition.

Implemented in liquibase.database.CacheDatabase, liquibase.database.DB2Database, liquibase.database.DerbyDatabase, liquibase.database.FirebirdDatabase, liquibase.database.H2Database, liquibase.database.HsqlDatabase, liquibase.database.MaxDBDatabase, liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase, liquibase.database.MySQLDatabase, liquibase.database.OracleDatabase, liquibase.database.PostgresDatabase, liquibase.database.SybaseDatabase, and liquibase.database.UnsupportedDatabase.

Referenced by liquibase.parser.filter.DbmsChangeSetFilter.DbmsChangeSetFilter().

String liquibase.database.Database.escapeTableName ( String  schemaName,
String  tableName 
)

Escapes the table name in a database-dependent manner so reserved words can be used as a table name (i.e.

"order"). Currently only escapes MS-SQL because other DBMSs store table names case-sensitively when escaping is used which could confuse end-users. Pass null to schemaName to use the default schema

Implemented in liquibase.database.AbstractDatabase, and liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase.

Referenced by liquibase.database.sql.UpdateStatement.getSqlStatement(), liquibase.database.sql.DeleteStatement.getSqlStatement(), liquibase.database.sql.CreateTableStatement.getSqlStatement(), liquibase.database.sql.AddDefaultValueStatement.getSqlStatement(), and liquibase.lock.LockHandler.listLocks().
